name: ALLBLACK Reminiscence
description:
ALLBLACK Reminiscence is an alternative/what-if story after the event of ALLBLACK Phase 1.

DETAILS

  • Format : Kinetic Novel (no choices)
  • Length : 4000 words
  • Language : English
  • Platform : PC (Windows, Mac, Linux), Android

TEAM

  • Original source of main story: fsc
  • VN Adaptation (Writing, art, program etc) : MadScientist

SUBMISSION TO WINTER VN JAM 2021
